content:
path /v3/xdc/gas
operationId XdcEstimateGas
summary Estimate the fee for a XinFin transaction
description 2 credits per API call
Get an estimated gas price and the number of gas units needed for a XinFin transaction The gas price is obtained from https//rpcxinfinnetwork/gasPrice
NOTE The estimated gas price is returned in wei However when making the transaction itself and providing the custom fee you have to provide the gas price in Gwei Make sure to convert the estimated gas price from wei to Gwei before submitting your transaction
requestBody
